abstract: The Deal Professor looks at some of the mysteries in the Bank of America-Merrill Lynch deal that are presented in the prepared testimony of Timothy J. Mayopolous, the bank’s former general counsel.
snippet: The Deal Professor looks at some of the mysteries in the Bank of America-Merrill Lynch deal that are presented in the prepared testimony of Timothy J. Mayopolous, the bank’s former general counsel.
lead_paragraph: Update | 1:29 p.m. For those who like mysteries, the testimony of Timothy J. Mayopoulos, the former general counsel of Bank of America, presents a few. Mr. Mayopoulos testified on Tuesday at yet another House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform hearing on the Bank of America-Merrill Lynch deal.

headline.main: Some Mysteries in the BofA-Merrill Deal

abstract: Bank of America representatives were asked about who would succeed Kenneth D. Lewis as the firm’s next chief executive at a House Oversight Committee hearing on Tuesday, with one legislator skeptical about the prospects of one candidate, Brian Moynihan.
snippet: Bank of America representatives were asked about who would succeed Kenneth D. Lewis as the firm’s next chief executive at a House Oversight Committee hearing on Tuesday, with one legislator skeptical about the prospects of one candidate, Brian Moy...
lead_paragraph: It appears even Congress is joining the Bank of America chief executive guessing game.

headline.main: At Hearing, Questions About BofA C.E.O. Candidate
